net.royalur.rules.state
 
  • Classes in net.royalur.rules.state used by net.royalur
    Class
    Description
    ActionGameState
    A game state that is included in the middle of a game to record an action that was taken, but that is not a valid state to be in.
    GameState
    A game state represents a single point within a game.
    PlayableGameState
    A game state where we are waiting for interactions from a player.
    WaitingForMoveGameState
    A game state where the game is waiting for a player to make a move.
    WaitingForRollGameState
    A game state where the game is waiting for a player to roll the dice.
    WinGameState
    A game state where a player has won the game.
  • Classes in net.royalur.rules.state used by net.royalur.agent
    Class
    Description
    WaitingForMoveGameState
    A game state where the game is waiting for a player to make a move.
  • Classes in net.royalur.rules.state used by net.royalur.notation
    Class
    Description
    ActionGameState
    A game state that is included in the middle of a game to record an action that was taken, but that is not a valid state to be in.
    GameState
    A game state represents a single point within a game.
    MovedGameState
    A game state that represents a move of a piece on the board.
    RolledGameState
    A game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.

  • Classes in net.royalur.rules.state used by net.royalur.rules.state
    Class
    Description
    AbstractGameState
    A game state represents a single point within a game.
    AbstractOngoingGameState
    A game state representing a single point within an ongoing game.
    ActionGameState
    A game state that is included in the middle of a game to record an action that was taken, but that is not a valid state to be in.
    ActionType
    The type of action that occurred in a state, or that is expected in a state.
    GameState
    A game state represents a single point within a game.
    OngoingGameState
    A game state from within a game where a winner has not yet been determined.
    PlayableGameState
    A game state where we are waiting for interactions from a player.
